Name: Altered Beast™
About the game: Athena, the daughter of Zeus, has been captured by the wicked Neff, God of the Underworld, and is being held captive. Summoned from the dead by Zeus himself, it is up to you now to clear five rounds of underlings before taking on Neff, in what promises to be the most gruelling of challenges.
Meta Title: Altered Beast™: Jun 1, 2010, SEGA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Altered Beast™? Check out the release date (Jun 1, 2010), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
